actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 93-296.
Measure passed House, roll call #271 (316-21).
Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-272.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #266 (73-1).
Conference scheduled in Senate.
Conference scheduled in House.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-411.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #412 (401-9).
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments.
Senate agreed to conference report, roll call #380 (88-0).
Senate receded and concurred in certain House amendments and disagreed to certain House amendments.
Senate requested further conference with House.
House requested further conference with Senate.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-569.
House agreed to conference report.
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments with an amendment.
Senate agreed to conference report.
Senate agreed to House amendment to Senate amendment.
Cleared for White House
Measure presented to President.
Signed by President.
Public law 93-137.

official_title: A bill making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development; for space, science, veterans, and certain other independent executive agencies, boards, commissions, and corporations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Housing and Urban Development; Space, Science, Veterans, and certain other Independent Agencies Appropriation Act
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Department of Housing and Urban Development; Space, Science, Veterans, and Certain Other Independent Agencies Appropriation Act - Makes appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development; for space science, veterans, and certain other independent executive agencies, boards, commissions, and corporations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

titles.title: Department of Housing and Urban Development; Space, Science, Veterans, and certain other Independent Agencies Appropriation Act

A bill making appropriations for the Department of Housing and Urban Development; for space, science, veterans, and certain other independent executive agencies, boards, commissions, and corporations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes.
